column1: 保存或清除所有视图层状态

column1: 将视图层保存为主工作区

column1: 将另一个镜头的属性复制到此镜头或所有队列镜头中
column2: Copy properties from another shot to this shot or all queued shots

column1: 应用于所有排队的镜头

column2: Split this shot at the selected frame, creating a complete copy

column1: 将另一个镜头合并到此镜头中，扩展其时间范围并删除目标。可选择合并视图层和规则。其他镜头数据将不会保留。
column2: Merge another shot into this one, extending its time range and deleting the target. Option to merge View Layers and Rules. Other shot data will not be preserved.

column1: 将目标镜头合并到活动镜头中。
column2: Merges the Target shot into the active shot.

column1: 将镜头移动到另一个索引
选择和/或查看项目属性

column2: Original scene to copy from, leave empty to import all.

column1: 添加新的属性覆盖，所有镜头都可访问
column2: Add a new property override, accessible by all shots

column1: 删除所有镜头的覆盖属性
column2: Delete a property override for all shots

column1: 删除的属性将从该场景的所有镜头中移除！
column2: Deleted properties will be removed from all shots within this scene!

column1: 以出厂设置进行渲染，防止第三方插件干扰渲染过程
column2: Render with factory settings to prevent 3rd party add-ons from interfering with the render process

column1: 显示 N 面板菜单
切换镜头管理器中的可见性

column1: 保存此项目的副本以进行渲染
column2: Save a copy of this project to render from

column2: Add B-Renderon integration. Note: Must be v2.2 or newer.

column1: Target= 射击目标的属性集合
column2: Target= properties collection of target shot

column1: 防止通过镜头数据用户界面更改镜头属性
column2: Prevent changes to shot properties via shot data UI
Notes, Use backslash \ to make a new line

column1: 要在叠加中显示的文本数据块中的文本
column2: Text from text data-block to be visible in overlay

column1: 为每个镜头创建子文件夹，防止潜在的覆盖，否则直接渲染到根目录。
column2: Create a subfolder for each Shot, preventing potiential overwriting, otherwise render directly to root directory.

column1: 仅显示已启用和主图层
仅显示已启用的视图图层和主图层
column2: Only display enabled View Layers and Primary Layers

column1: 在时间线的镜头之间进行缩放。
用新镜头生成主视图层。

column1: 切换镜头时将视图设置为帧范围。如果启用了序列缩放，则会禁用
column2: Set view to frame range when switching shots. Disabled if Sequence Scrubbing is enabled

column1: 队列所有镜头进行批量输出
column2: Queue all shots for batch output

column1: 为未保存的视图图层选择默认状态
column2: Select a default state for unsaved View Layers

column1: 镜头变化时跳转到第一帧，否则保持在帧范围内
column2: Jump to First Frame on shot change, otherwise keep withing frame range

column1: 输出文件名和帧号的分隔符
column2: Separator for output filename and frame number

column1: 下一个或上一个镜头与捕捉位置之间的帧数。
column2: The number of frames between next or previous shot and snapping position.

column1: 从单个文件提交和渲染，以减少保存时间
column2: Submit and render from a single file to reduce saving time

column1: 自上而下播放序列，否则按顺序播放整个镜头
column2: Play sequence with top down dominance, otherwise play entire shots in order

column2: No Rule definitions, make one in the Rule Book to get started

column1: JSON 文件包含大部分 Shot 数据。
column2: JSON files contain most Shot data.
